series: Corpus scriptorum Christianorum Orientalium -- v. 623-624. -- Scriptores Armeniaci -- t. 29-30
title: Two anonymous sets of scholia on Dionysius the Areopagite's Heavenly hierarchy
by_statement: edited [and translated by] Sergio La Porta.

notes.value:
Complemented by: The Armenian scholia on Dionysius the Areopagite : studies on their literary and philological tradition (Corpus scriptorum Christianorum Orientalium ; v. 625).

Includes bibliographical references (v. 2, p. [iv]-vi) and indexes.

Text in Armenian (vol. 1), with English translation in vol. 2; introduction and apparatus in English.
